docs.title: Configuration Files
docs.text: Complete reference for all CodeGeass configuration files.

docs.title: File Locations
docs.text:
./config/                     # Project configuration
├── schedules.yaml            # Task definitions
├── settings.yaml             # Project settings
└── notifications.yaml        # Notification channels

~/.codegeass/                 # Global user configuration
├── projects.yaml             # Project registry (multi-project)
├── credentials.yaml          # Secrets (API keys, tokens)
└── skills/                   # Shared skills (all projects)

./data/                       # Runtime data (gitignored)
├── logs/                     # Execution logs (JSONL)
└── sessions/                 # Claude session data

docs.title: schedules.yaml
docs.text: Task definitions file.

docs.title: Schema
docs.text:
tasks:
  - id: string              # Required: Unique identifier
    name: string            # Optional: Human-readable name
    schedule: string        # Required: CRON expression
    prompt: string          # Required*: Instructions for Claude
    skill: string           # Required*: Skill name (if using skill mode)
    skill_args: string      # Optional: Arguments for skill
    working_dir: string     # Optional: Directory to run in
    enabled: bool           # Optional: Whether active (default: true)
    mode: string            # Optional: headless|autonomous|skill
    plan_mode: bool         # Optional: Enable approval workflow
    timeout: int            # Optional: Execution timeout (seconds)

*Either prompt or skill is required, not both.

docs.title: Example
docs.text:
tasks:
  - id: daily-review
    name: Daily Code Review
    schedule: "0 9 * * 1-5"
    prompt: |
      Review commits from the last 24 hours.
      Focus on:
      - Code quality
      - Potential bugs
      - Security issues
    working_dir: /home/user/myproject
    enabled: true
    mode: headless

  - id: weekly-cleanup
    name: Weekly Cleanup
    schedule: "0 6 * * 6"
    prompt: "Clean up unused imports and fix linting issues"
    mode: autonomous
    plan_mode: true
    timeout: 1800

  - id: skill-based-task
    name: Skill Task
    schedule: "0 10 * * *"
    skill: review
    skill_args: "Check the API module"
    mode: skill

docs.title: Task Modes
docs.text: Mode Description headless Read-only, uses claude -p autonomous Full access, uses --dangerously-skip-permissions skill Invokes a skill from .claude/skills/

docs.title: settings.yaml
docs.text: Project-wide settings.

docs.title: Schema
docs.text:
# Working directory default
default_working_dir: string

# Default execution mode
default_mode: string

# Logging configuration
logging:
  level: string             # DEBUG|INFO|WARNING|ERROR
  format: string            # json|text

# Session management
sessions:
  retention_days: int       # Days to keep sessions
  max_sessions: int         # Maximum sessions to retain

# Plan mode defaults
plan_mode:
  default_timeout: int      # Approval timeout (seconds)
  auto_approve: bool        # Skip approval (not recommended)

# Scheduler settings
scheduler:
  check_interval: int       # Seconds between checks
  max_concurrent: int       # Max concurrent executions

docs.title: Example
docs.text:
default_working_dir: /home/user/myproject
default_mode: headless

logging:
  level: INFO
  format: json

sessions:
  retention_days: 30
  max_sessions: 1000

plan_mode:
  default_timeout: 3600
  auto_approve: false

scheduler:
  check_interval: 60
  max_concurrent: 3

docs.title: notifications.yaml
docs.text: Notification channel configuration.

docs.title: Schema
docs.text:
channels:
  - id: string              # Required: Unique identifier
    provider: string        # Required: telegram|discord
    enabled: bool           # Optional: Whether active (default: true)
    events:                 # Optional: Events to notify on
      - string              # task_completed|task_failed|approval_required|approval_timeout

docs.title: Example
docs.text:
channels:
  - id: telegram-main
    provider: telegram
    enabled: true
    events:
      - task_completed
      - task_failed
      - approval_required

  - id: discord-alerts
    provider: discord
    enabled: true
    events:
      - task_failed

  - id: telegram-approvals
    provider: telegram
    enabled: true
    events:
      - approval_required
      - approval_timeout

docs.title: Event Types
docs.text: Event When Triggered task_completed Task finished successfully task_failed Task failed with error approval_required Plan mode task needs approval approval_timeout Approval window expired

docs.title: credentials.yaml
docs.text: Secrets file (global, never commit).

docs.title: Location
docs.text: ~/.codegeass/credentials.yaml

docs.title: Schema
docs.text:
telegram:
  bot_token: string         # Telegram bot token
  chat_id: string           # Telegram chat ID

discord:

docs.text:

  bot_token: "123456:ABC-DEF1234ghIkl-zyx57W2v1u123ew11"

discord:
  webhook_url: "https://discord.com/api/webhooks/1234567890/abcdefghijk..."

docs.title: Security
docs.text:
Set restrictive permissions:

chmod 600 ~/.codegeass/credentials.yaml

docs.title: Location
docs.text: ./data/logs/*.jsonl

docs.title: Format (JSONL)
docs.text:
Each line is a JSON object:

{"id": "abc123", "task_id": "daily-review", "started_at": "2024-01-15T09:00:00Z", "completed_at": "2024-01-15T09:05:23Z", "status": "completed", "exit_code": 0, "mode": "headless"}

docs.title: Fields
docs.text: Field Type Description id string Execution ID task_id string Task that was run started_at datetime Start time (ISO 8601) completed_at datetime End time (ISO 8601) status string Status (see below) exit_code int Claude exit code mode string Execution mode used error string Error message (if failed)

docs.title: Status Values
docs.text: Status Description running Currently executing completed Finished successfully failed Failed with error waiting_approval Plan mode awaiting approval approved Plan approved, continuing rejected Plan rejected timeout Execution or approval timed out

docs.title: Location
docs.text: ./data/sessions/<execution-id>.json

docs.title: Format
docs.text:
{
  "id": "abc123",
  "task_id": "daily-review",
  "started_at": "2024-01-15T09:00:00Z",
  "completed_at": "2024-01-15T09:05:23Z",
  "status": "completed",
  "mode": "headless",
  "working_dir": "/home/user/myproject",
  "output": "Claude's full response...",
  "tool_calls": [
    {
      "tool": "Read",
      "input": {"file": "src/main.py"},
      "output": "..."
    }
  ],
  "duration_seconds": 323,
  "exit_code": 0
}

docs.title: projects.yaml
docs.text: Global project registry for multi-project mode.

docs.title: Location
docs.text: ~/.codegeass/projects.yaml

docs.title: Schema
docs.text:
version: int                  # Schema version (currently 1)
default_project: string       # ID of default project
shared_skills_dir: string     # Path to shared skills directory

projects:
  - id: string                # Required: Unique project ID (auto-generated)
    name: string              # Required: Human-readable name
    path: string              # Required: Absolute path to project
    description: string       # Optional: Project description
    default_model: string     # Optional: Default Claude model (haiku|sonnet|opus)
    default_timeout: int      # Optional: Default timeout in seconds
    default_autonomous: bool  # Optional: Enable autonomous mode by default
    git_remote: string        # Optional: Git remote URL (auto-detected)
    enabled: bool             # Optional: Whether project is active (default: true)
    use_shared_skills: bool   # Optional: Include shared skills (default: true)
    created_at: string        # Optional: ISO 8601 timestamp

docs.title: Example
docs.text:
version: 1
default_project: a1b2c3d4
shared_skills_dir: ~/.codegeass/skills
projects:
  - id: a1b2c3d4
    name: api-server
    path: /home/user/projects/api-server
    description: "REST API backend"
    default_model: sonnet
    default_timeout: 300
    default_autonomous: false
    git_remote: https://github.com/user/api-server
    enabled: true
    use_shared_skills: true
    created_at: "2024-01-15T09:00:00Z"

  - id: e5f6g7h8
    name: web-frontend
    path: /home/user/projects/web-frontend
    description: "React web application"
    default_model: haiku
    default_timeout: 180
    enabled: true
    use_shared_skills: true
    created_at: "2024-01-20T14:30:00Z"

docs.title: Management
docs.text:
This file is managed by CLI commands:

# Add a project
codegeass project add /path/to/project --name my-project

# Remove a project
codegeass project remove my-project

# Update settings
codegeass project update my-project --model opus --timeout 600

# Set default
codegeass project set-default my-project

docs.title: Validation
docs.text:
Validate configuration files:

# Validate tasks
codegeass task list

# Validate skills
codegeass skill validate --all

# Validate projects
codegeass project list

# Test notifications
codegeass notification test telegram

docs.title: Environment Variables
docs.text: Complete reference for environment variables used by CodeGeass.

docs.title: CODEGEASS_CONFIG_DIR
docs.text:
Override the configuration directory location.

export CODEGEASS_CONFIG_DIR=/custom/path/config

Default: ./config (relative to current directory)

docs.title: CODEGEASS_DATA_DIR
docs.text:
Override the data directory location.

export CODEGEASS_DATA_DIR=/custom/path/data

Default: ./data (relative to current directory)

docs.title: CODEGEASS_LOG_LEVEL
docs.text:
Set logging verbosity.

export CODEGEASS_LOG_LEVEL=DEBUG

Values: DEBUG, INFO, WARNING, ERROR Default: INFO

docs.title: CODEGEASS_CREDENTIALS_FILE
docs.text:
Override credentials file location.

export CODEGEASS_CREDENTIALS_FILE=/custom/path/credentials.yaml

Default: ~/.codegeass/credentials.yaml

docs.title: ANTHROPIC_API_KEY
docs.text:
API key for Anthropic API access.

export ANTHROPIC_API_KEY=sk-ant-...

CRON Behavior

CodeGeass deliberately unsets this variable in CRON context to force usage of your Claude Pro/Max subscription instead of API credits.

docs.title: CLAUDE_MODEL
docs.text:
Override the default Claude model.

export CLAUDE_MODEL=claude-3-opus

Default: Uses Claude Code's default model

docs.title: TELEGRAM_BOT_TOKEN
docs.text:
Alternative way to provide Telegram bot token.

export TELEGRAM_BOT_TOKEN=123456:ABC-DEF...

Overrides value in credentials.yaml.

docs.title: TELEGRAM_CHAT_ID
docs.text:
Alternative way to provide Telegram chat ID.

export TELEGRAM_CHAT_ID=-1001234567890

Overrides value in credentials.yaml.

docs.title: DISCORD_WEBHOOK_URL
docs.text:
Alternative way to provide Discord webhook URL.

export DISCORD_WEBHOOK_URL=https://discord.com/api/webhooks/...

Overrides value in credentials.yaml.

docs.title: PATH
docs.text:
Ensure CRON can find required binaries.

# In crontab
PATH=/usr/local/bin:/usr/bin:/bin:/home/user/.local/bin

docs.title: PYTHONPATH
docs.text:
If needed for custom installations.

export PYTHONPATH=/custom/lib/python

docs.title: Runtime Variables
docs.text: These are set automatically during task execution:

docs.title: CODEGEASS_TASK_ID
docs.text:
Current task identifier.

echo $CODEGEASS_TASK_ID
# Output: daily-review

docs.title: CODEGEASS_EXECUTION_ID
docs.text:
Current execution identifier.

echo $CODEGEASS_EXECUTION_ID
# Output: abc123

docs.title: CODEGEASS_WORKING_DIR
docs.text:
Task's working directory.

echo $CODEGEASS_WORKING_DIR
# Output: /home/user/myproject

docs.title: CRON Environment
docs.text: When running via CRON, the environment is minimal. Important settings:

docs.title: Recommended CRON Setup
docs.text:
SHELL=/bin/bash
PATH=/usr/local/bin:/usr/bin:/bin:/home/user/.local/bin
CODEGEASS_LOG_LEVEL=INFO

* * * * * cd /home/user/project && codegeass scheduler run-due

docs.title: Environment Inheritance
docs.text:
CRON does not inherit your shell environment. To use environment from your profile:

* * * * * . /home/user/.profile && codegeass scheduler run-due

Or source specific files:

* * * * * . /home/user/.env && codegeass scheduler run-due

docs.title: Docker Environment
docs.text:
When running in Docker:

ENV CODEGEASS_CONFIG_DIR=/app/config
ENV CODEGEASS_DATA_DIR=/app/data
ENV CODEGEASS_LOG_LEVEL=INFO

# docker-compose.yml
services:
  codegeass:
    environment:
      - CODEGEASS_CONFIG_DIR=/app/config
      - CODEGEASS_DATA_DIR=/app/data
      - TELEGRAM_BOT_TOKEN=${TELEGRAM_BOT_TOKEN}
      - TELEGRAM_CHAT_ID=${TELEGRAM_CHAT_ID}

docs.title: Priority Order
docs.text:
Settings are loaded in this order (later overrides earlier):

  1. Default values
  2. Configuration files (settings.yaml, etc.)
  3. Environment variables
  4. Command-line arguments

docs.title: Debugging
docs.text:
View current environment:

# In shell
env | grep CODEGEASS

# What Claude Code sees
claude --print-env

Test CRON environment:

# Add to crontab temporarily
* * * * * env > /tmp/cron-env.txt

Then check /tmp/cron-env.txt to see what CRON provides.
